attributes.action: Prevent any exams from going ahead this year during the COVID-19 pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: It is important that we do this for the mental health of young people, many of whom have struggled with the repercussions of not being able to go out and see friends which can be very stressful and the last thing that we as young people need is knowing that we will have any exams this summer including internal exams.
attributes.background: Cancel all exams even internal exams which have been suggested to help the CAG’s but would be unfair on people who have been disproportionately affected by the pandemic.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570228
